tit.cmt: 定訳にはスペースが入っているので入れました。

sen.j: 渟名城入媛命（ぬなきいりびめのみこと、生没年未詳）は、崇神天皇の皇女で、母は尾張大海媛。
sen.e: Princess Numakiiribime [(渟名城入媛命) Nunakiiribime no Mikoto; the dates of her birth and death are unknown] was a princess of the Emperor Suinin (崇神天皇).
sen.cmt: 一原文一訳文例外対処
sen.e: Princess Numaki iribime (Nunaki iribime no Mikoto; the dates of her birth and death are unknown) was a princess of the Emperor Suinin.
sen.cmt: スペース入れました。
sen.e: Princess Numaki iribime (Nunaki iribime no Mikoto; the dates of her birth and death are unknown) was a princess of the Emperor Suinin.
sen.cmt: 修正なし

sen.e: The mother of Princess Nunakiiribime was Owari no Ooshiamahime [(尾張大海媛); it is also pronounced as "Owari no Ooamahime"].
sen.cmt: 一原文一訳文例外対処
sen.e: The mother of Princess Nunaki iribime was Owari no Ooshiamahime.
sen.cmt: スペース入れました。
sen.e: The mother of Princess Nunaki iribime was Owari no Ooshiamahime.
sen.cmt: 修正なし

sen.j: 同母兄に八坂入彦命らがいる。
sen.e: Prince Yasakairibiko (八坂入彦命) was a maternal brother (son of the Emperor Sujin) of Princess Nunakiiribime.
sen.cmt: 一原文一訳文例外対処
sen.e: Prince Yasakairibiko was his maternal half-brother of Princess Nunaki iribime.
sen.cmt: 同母兄変更しました。
sen.e: Prince Yasakairibiko was his maternal half-brother of Princess Nunaki iribime.
sen.cmt: 修正なし

sen.j: 異母兄弟に垂仁天皇、豊城入彦命らがいる。
sen.e: The paternal half brothers of Princess Nunakiiribime were The Emperor Suinin (垂仁天皇) and Prince Toyokiiribiko (豊城入彦命)
sen.cmt: 一原文一訳文例外対処
sen.e: The paternal half-brothers of Princess Nunaki iribime were The Emperor Suinin and Prince Toyokiiribiko.
sen.cmt: ハイフンと異母兄弟変更しました。
sen.e: The paternal half-brothers of Princess Nunaki iribime were The Emperor Suinin and Prince Toyokiiribiko.
sen.cmt: 修正なし

sen.j: 沼名木之入日売命とも書く。
sen.e: Princess Numakiiribe (渟名城入媛命) was also written in this way, "Nunakiiribime no Mikoto (沼名木之入日売命)."
Princess Numaki iribe (渟名城入媛命) was also written as unakiiribime no Mikoto (沼名木之入日売命).
sen.cmt: ハイフンを付け、とダブルクオートを削除しました。
sen.e: Princess Numaki iribe (渟名城入媛命) was also written as unakiiribime no Mikoto (沼名木之入日売命).
sen.cmt: 修正なし

sen.j: 紀元前92年に、天皇の命により、倭大国魂神を祀る。
sen.e: In B.C '92,' the Emperor Suinin ordered Princess Numakiiribe to worship 'Yamato no Ookuni Tamanokami (a Japanese God appearing in Japanese Mythology).'
sen.cmt: 一原文一訳文例外対処
sen.e: In B.C 92, the Emperor Suinin ordered Princess Numakiiribe to worship 'Yamato no Ookuni Tamanokami (a Japanese God appearing in Japanese Mythology).'
sen.cmt: シングルクオートを削除しました。ここにあるthe Emperor Suininの確認はできませんでした。
sen.e: In B.C 92, the Emperor Suinin ordered Princess Numakiiribe to worship 'Yamato no Ookuni Tamanokami (a Japanese God appearing in Japanese Mythology).'
sen.cmt: 修正なし

sen.j: しかし、1年ほどで、髪が抜け落ち、体も痩せて、祭祀が出来なくなった。
sen.e: However, after one year pasted, the Princess Numakiiribe lost much of her hair and weight; then, she would eventually became too weak to perform the Saishi (religious service) ceremony.
sen.cmt: 一原文一訳文例外対処
sen.e: However, after one year pasted, the Princess Numaki iribime lost much of her hair and weight; then, she eventually became too weak to perform the Saishi (religious service) ceremony.
sen.cmt: Numakiiribe→Numaki iribimeに訂正、wouldの削除しました。
sen.e: However, after one year pasted, the Princess Numaki iribime lost much of her hair and weight; then, she eventually became too weak to perform the Saishi (religious service) ceremony.
sen.cmt: 修正なし
